channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ZOOKEEPER-2474] add a way for client to reattach to a session when using ZKClientConfig
item.description:
The new constructors for ZooKeeper instances take a ZKClientConfig, which is great, however there is no way to reattach to an existing session.

New constructors should be added to allow passing a session id and password when using ZKClientConfig.
item.summary: add a way for client to reattach to a session when using ZKClientConfig

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Thanks timothyjward for reporting, i will soon submit a patch.

against trunk revision 1755379.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 3 new or modified tests.
